pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Scatter Plot and Volcano Plot Labels // Interactive labelling of scatter plots, volcano plots and Manhattan plots using a 'shiny' and 'plotly' interface. Users can hover over points to see where specific points are located and click points on/off to easily label them. Labels can be dragged around the plot to place them optimally. Plots can be exported directly to PDF for publication. For plots with large numbers of points, points can optionally be rasterized as a bitmap, while all other elements (axes, text, labels lines) are preserved as vector objects. This can dramatically reduce file size for plots with millions of points such as Manhattan plots, and is ideal for publication.
